text: Sid Tepper (June 25, 1918 â€“ April 24, 2015) was an American songwriter. He was best known for working with with Roy C. Bennett, which created several hits for Elvis Presley. Between 1945 and 1970, Tepper and Bennett published over 300 songs. He died on April 24, 2015, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American songwriters Category:Writers from New York City
title: Sid Tepper
